mapper.select: select id as id , created_at as createdAt , updated_at as updatedAt , nama as nama , div_id as divId , dept_id as deptId , position_id as positionId , level_id as levelId , email as email , tel_no as telNo , password as password from users where id = #{id}
select id as id , parent as parent , name as name , image as image , grid_id as gridId from menuitem m order by id

select id as id , type_grid as typeGrid , column_no as columnNo , column_name as columnName , cell_factory as cellFactory , column_size as columnSize from grid_column where type_grid = #{gridId} order by column_no asc

select id as compMapId , num as no , category as category , description as dtlCategory , indicator_1 as indicator1 , indicator_2 as indicator2 , indicator_3 as indicator3 , indicator_4 as indicator4 , indicator_5 as indicator5 from competency_map order by num asc
select * from competency_scale order by score
select count(*) as cnt from evaluation_base
select id as id , created_at as createdAt , updated_at as updatedAt , start_dt as startDt , end_dt as endDt , addendum as addendum , to_hrd as toHrd from evaluation_base where id = #{evaluationId}

select (a.basicComp + b.teknikalComp) totalScore from ( select sum(cs.score) as basicComp from competency_score_map csm, competency_scale cs where csm.evaluation_id = #{evaluationId} and csm.comp_map_id = #{compMapId} and csm.scale_id = cs.id ) a, ( select sum(cs.score) as teknikalComp from competency_teknikal ct, competency_scale cs where ct.evaluation_id = #{evaluationId} and ct.scale_id = cs.id ) b

select id as id
remark as name from work_scale
